body_html:
@sobhansepid The above message tells you that you have successfully installed TensorFlow GPU and it was able to locate GPU availability on your system.
However the initial error message may have arisen due to ongoing computations on your system. Not sure exactly what can trigger. Try terminate all processes and give a fresh try for your GPU computation process.

body:
@sobhansepid The above message tells you that you have successfully installed TensorFlow GPU and it was able to locate GPU availability on your system.
However the initial error message may have arisen due to ongoing computations on your system. Not sure exactly what can trigger. Try terminate all processes and give a fresh try for your GPU computation process.
